---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse);library(lmtest); library(sandwich); library(knitr)
```

```{r}
discrim <- read_rds("../data/discrim.rds")
```

```{r}
black <- lm(presp_black ~ gentrify_composite + med_hh_inc_2017 + med_gross_rent_2017 + p_white + tract_high_schol_score + tract_assault + p_higherthan_highschool, data = discrim)
summary(black)
coeftest(black, vcov = vcovHC(black, type="HC1")) %>% 
  kable(format = "markdown")

white <- lm(presp_white ~ gentrify_composite + med_hh_inc_2017 + med_gross_rent_2017 + p_white + tract_high_schol_score + tract_assault + p_higherthan_highschool, data = discrim)
coeftest(white, vcov = vcovHC(white, type="HC1"))
```
